ValidationRule.description: Billing or Shipping Address should be complete for the Pricing Affiliation Record Type(Enterprise Solutions).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND((RecordTypeId = '012800000002Byz'),
AND((ISBLANK(BillingCity) || ISBLANK(BillingState) || ISBLANK(BillingStreet ) || ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode) || ISBLANK(BillingCountry)), ( ISBLANK(ShippingCity) || ISBLANK(ShippingState) || ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ) || ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode) || ISBLANK(ShippingCountry))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide complete address(Street, City, State, Postal Code, Country)
